String ls_dbdriver = "oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver";    String ls_connstr = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@**.**.**.**:1521:szcust";    String ls_username = "sztweb";    String ls_password = "sztweb";    Class.forName(ls_dbdriver);    this.conn = DriverManager.getConnection(ls_connstr, ls_username, ls_password);    this.conn.setAutoCommit(false);    this.stmt = this.conn.createStatement(1005, 1008);
